Story.Name: Treasure_HY
Story.Desc: [NAME]I know that the fire domain is not a peaceful place. In the rumors, the ninth layer of fire area burned a true immortal to death.

li.Display: Go in and see
Not interested.

Story.Name: ZT_HY
Story.Desc: [NAME]Standing in front of the fire, smelled a taste of roasting himself.

li.Display: 1st Layer (500C, carrying bodhi seeds or evasion >= to 300%)
2nd Layer (650C, carrying bodhi or qi protection level >= than 15)
3rd Layer(1000C, carrying bodhi seeds or DaoHang > 90)
4th Layer (1700C, carrying bodhi seeds or DaoHang > 150)
5th Layer (2100C, carrying bodhi seeds can get items or qi >= 5 million)
6th Layer (3100C, carrying bodhi seeds or qi >= 100 million)
7th Layer (4800C, carrying bodhi seeds or furnace tripods with an upper limit greater than 10,000)
8th Layer (6500C, carrying bodhi seeds or qi protection >= forty)
9th Layer (not installed, die when you enter, really)
Not interested..

Story.Name: HUO_CH
Story.Desc: Refining the fire of the fire domain, each flame will be improved to different degrees, can be quenched, can strengthen magic weapons. If the realm is insufficient, it will be back bitten.

li.Display: Come on, it's all about to die anyway. (Three hundred road trips)
give up
li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]I feel that my skin is not thick enough, and I am afraid that I will not cook it well."))
